name: hci-social-backend
description: Backend/API layer for the UB CSE370 course project

scripts.develop: shx mkdir -p public/uploads/files && npm run build && concurrently "tsc -p tsconfig.app.json -w" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development supervisor -w ./build --no-restart-on error ./build/index.js"
scripts.test: npm run build:test && concurrently "tsc -p tsconfig.test.json -w" "cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --file ./build/test.js -w \"./build/**/*.spec.js\""
scripts.e2e: npm run build:e2e && concurrently "tsc -p tsconfig.e2e.json -w" "cross-env NODE_ENV=e2e mocha --file ./build/e2e.js -w \"./build/e2e/**/*.js\""
scripts.reset-db: npm run build && npx foal run reset-db
scripts.push-schema: npm run build && npx foal run push-schema
scripts.make-migrations: npm run build && npx foal run make-migrations
scripts.migrate: npm run build && npx foal run migrate
